website_summaries.verdict: With more features, space, and thickness than competitors, this kneeling pad has a lot to offer to make gardening and other tasks easier on the knees.
pros: High-density memory foam is more than 2 inches thick
Folding design offers more kneeling space than most competing brands
cons: Cushioning "gives" too much for some gardeners
Heavier and bulkier than more basic models

customer_reviews.title: “Gardening mat”
customer_reviews.text: So i got this to make “gardening” more comfortable. Gotta say it works quite nice. Keep it in the shower and use it on a regular basis to “garden” with my husband. Best purchase this year😉
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: This is one plush kneeler, I bought this for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one plush kneeler, I bought this for one of my employees to use on job sites when she kneels as she has a knee injury and can't kneel with the knees of hard surfaces. The kneeler is built well all the seams are sealed thoroughly The thickness and the sponginess of this kneeler makes it well worth the money. It far exceeds a basic rubber pad, the memory foam is a must have if you have any problems with kneeling.
customer_reviews.author: endlesspossibilities

customer_reviews.title: Likely Best Available
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable kneeling pad. Another reviewer is correct that it is not enough for complete comfort on a hard surface, but I expect this pad to be the best available. As such I award five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: OMG I love this pad
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this pad. I have had total knee replacement and this allows me to comfortably kneel on concrete, on rocky soil. Its great. My husband who is usually too "manly" to use such a thing has been stealing it to use while installing baseboard .
customer_reviews.author: Carol R

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSHION FOR AROUND THE HOUSE!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthrisi in my knees an this cushion is an absolute GOD send for chores around the house. I've had it for a few months now and the memory foam is holding up well. I've also spilled stuff on it and the material holds up extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: 1 special rose

customer_reviews.title: Repurposed as a bench seat cushion - Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I know that this is a kneeling pad, but I bought it for camping! Those picnic table benches get awfully hard during an evening of cards, Yahtzee, etc. This Garden Kneeler was the perfect size for the bench seat, didn't slide around on the bench, and it saved my hips and fanny! Great product. Only drawback was... It Rained. The Kneeler soaked up the rain water like a sponge, but it dried out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protecting my knees
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kneeling pad as an alternative to knee pads. I planned to spend several hours holding burn perimeters and Burning Man and had not had good results with knee pads. This item is perfect! I was able to clip it to my backpack with a carabiner, and it was lightweight and not obtrusive. As stated above, I was on my knees for several hours, and the thick padding that formed to my knees was ideal. I had no pain at all. (By the way, I'm 57 years old and have arthritis.) I also used it for sitting several times. This kneeling pad was extremely comfortable, easy to use, and inexpensive. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: This foam support is so much better than the cheaper ones
customer_reviews.text: This foam support is so much better than the cheaper ones! I have bad knees and have to kneel sometimes at work. It is very soft, I can even sit on it. Great for sitting on park benches, concerts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Too hard!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this be use I have bad knees and cannot kneel on a hard floor. This thing was almost as hard as the floor. It went back.
customer_reviews.author: Haley08

customer_reviews.title: Attention photographers! These are the best knee protectors I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for photography shots that require a lot of kneeling. I have tried multiple kneeling pads and knee protectors and these are hands down the best. I have no knee pain when I am kneeling on these pads plus these make kneeling much more stable, especially when you have to get into awkward positions to get the shot. The size is perfect for packing around and I also love the fact that it is water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Deri C Dority

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Love this kneeling pad. Have bad knees and this will help when gardening or doing any other chores. Glad I found and purchased it. Substantial in size. Love the fact it folds which is quite handy. Very comfortable as well. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Adkins

customer_reviews.title: My Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Husband has had knee problems off and on and I mentioned getting him a pad for his knees when he has a project that his knees are on the ground like pulling weeds etc. I now plan on getting one for myself also. We both spend hours in our yard in the summer dealing with dandelions etc. and these will be great. He's used it already and is happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: all around kneeling pad not just for gardening.
customer_reviews.text: i didn’t get this for gardening; as I’ve climbed in age, kneeling or even sitting on the floor has become very difficult. this pad has made it possible for me to once again do those chores that i’ve been staying away from. and the little ones like it to.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. Ginart

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this a lot more than the general hard foam ones all over Amazon, which can be abrasive to bare knees. This is much more comfortable and my only wish is for it to be 1-2 inches thicker. After kneeling on it for awhile in one sitting the foam sinks pretty low and close to the ground. 1-2 more inches should do it, but possibly more for heavier people (I’m under 110 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Ju

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as I had hoped. I planted September potatoes and my knees felt so comfortable. I flip it over and use the gray side to appear more "MANLY" :P I'm probably going to use this for grooming and bathing the dogs, cleaning filters and soon other work around the outside of the house. Might pickup a 2nd one for indoor use on the basement concrete floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is great for yoga
customer_reviews.text: this is great for yoga. i do senior yoga and dont get on the floor much but when i do i use this. product is more than helpful for the knees or at times for the behind. i also use this if i have to clean something below the cabnets on the floor. just good for the knees in general
customer_reviews.author: ann jordon

customer_reviews.title: Keep going
customer_reviews.text: Melts u der knees. Gives way like instantaneously. Would be better to use like three towels filed up.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Having had a recent knee replacement, kneeling is very difficult and quite painful. This kneeling pad is fabulous. The memory foam is very thick and the covering is waterproof and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: YR

customer_reviews.title: The best kneeling pad by far
customer_reviews.text: For the kind of work we do, the technicians often need to kneel on cement and other hard floors, and I have been purchasing kneeling pads for many years. I had purchased heavy duty rubber, shock absorbing pads for quite some time. I only purchased one pad (so far), and everyone wants to use it. I have no higher praise.
customer_reviews.author: ben g.

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Kneeling Pads I Have Tried
customer_reviews.text: I like this kneeling pad. Quite comfortable. I deducted a star because the underside slips on my floor when I lean forward. This is a good quality pad, that is a good thickness. And the foldable part of this is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyALot OnAmazonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised. It is very comfortable and the best part is that it returns to the normal shape. The best part is that f you leave it doubled over, you can use it to sit on. It is the best product for all around use, The carrying handle is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Y. R. Kurimoto

customer_reviews.title: Very thick, good quality, portable and worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my father to use around the house and outdoors when he is working in the yard. It is very thick and portable. My dad has used it multiple times now and said that he is very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 82 and still enjoy gardening but weeding was taking a toll on my knees until I bought this kneeling pad. It is very comfortable and provides a great cushion. I'm glad I spent the extra money as it is so much butter than the previous kneeling pads I had even when I would use three, one on top of the other.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Thick and hefty
customer_reviews.text: Very thick and well made. We use it at the fireplace to put in wood and in the garden. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: RockawayRa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute, and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for support. I even use it as a sitting cushion at Hmong funeral. Great amount of thickness for support.
customer_reviews.author: LoArchay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love this kneeling pad. It's so sturdy and well made. I tried another pad bought on Amazon, it had good reviews and 1/2 the price, it was terrible (same design with flowers on it). This one is soft but your knees don't sink in so low you can feel the floor. It's sturdy, so you feel stable. So so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: William Telish

customer_reviews.title: This kneeling pad works great in the garden and around the house
customer_reviews.text: This kneeling pad works great in the garden and around the house. I'm 6'3", 260 lbs and it is soft, yet supportive. Easy to carry around, I can sit on it folded or unfolded, kneel on it, and no matter what it is comfortable and provides support. Wish I had purchased this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I am just coming off knee replacement surgery so kneeling has been difficult until I purchased the pads which are dense enough to keep my knee off of hard surfaces making kneeling more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: James W. Milligan

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Great for sitting and kneeling on. Has made my yard work much less painful.
customer_reviews.author: ALLEN K PRESCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: We use them in our airboat as seating. They are very comfortable to sit on and fold up small to fit in storage compartments. Would be a nice addition for any type of boat.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely fantastic garden kneeler. I purchased it for my mom who absolutely adores it. It's really thick and absolutely fantastic to either sit or kneel on. I would absolutely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Kneeling pad
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this product. Use around the house and in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: sheila Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Extra thickness, ability to fold and the strap to carry.
customer_reviews.text: Thicker, easier to fold and carry and keep close at hand to use when I have fallen and can't get up due to painful knees.
customer_reviews.author: annies aunt

customer_reviews.title: Provides ample cushioning.
customer_reviews.text: My knee replacement and my other very sore knee made it impossible for me to kneel. Although this cushion is a bit harder than I wanted, I am now able to kneel without excessive pain. It is light enough to carry easily and not too bulky to store.
customer_reviews.author: Laptop's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Thick
customer_reviews.text: Provides good support for old knees. Thick cushioning. Folds up well for storage
customer_reviews.author: gnk

customer_reviews.title: Not Soft for my Knees
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my garden when I kneel on the hard ground to weed, etc.. Unfortunately, there is plastic piece in between the two layers of foam which is quite hard. Because of that, when I kneel on the memory foam, it "indents" right to the plastic and I feel like I have no cushion at all. I cannot understand how other people find this comfortable. I have had knee replacements and I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lilette S Bagwin

customer_reviews.title: No more pain kneeling!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally comfortable on my knees! No more pain in my knees when I have to kneel for tasks or exercise!!
customer_reviews.author: KMac

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product!
customer_reviews.text: It works well and is quite comfortable. It slides around as I need it to and the pad size is generous!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie V.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have had both knees replaced and this pad makes kneeling to clean so much more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Really really comfortable to kneel on! Definitely worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Copernicus

customer_reviews.title: Keep gardening with bad knees
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for friend who has bad knees and likes to garden. Memory foam comfortable and protects knees. Lightweight. Product arrived promptly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: definitely needed for related work out. Whatever comes with the equipment are the pad too thin to be protective.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft, and large
customer_reviews.text: To save your knees, you need one of these. Nice and Large !
customer_reviews.author: Saul Goodman

customer_reviews.title: It's great. It's great
customer_reviews.text: This mat looks very comfortable and nice. The size looks perfect. It makes me want to buy it, so I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mercier

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful
customer_reviews.text: I've 8 dogs to bathe and its tough on the knees... Very tough. This has helped wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product for Knees
customer_reviews.text: I didn't tear a ligament in my knee, but I did come close to it. When kneeling on the floor, I was in a great deal of pain. This pad has been wonderful and not hard like other pads I tried.
customer_reviews.author: moonsbreath

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: Worthless - no cushion at all. It collapses completely under the weight of a person's body, and I'm not a heavy person. It might be OK for a head rest, but certainly not a knee pad as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kneeling pad is light to carry around and comfortable for your knees. Thickness is great.
customer_reviews.author: William Golson

customer_reviews.title: Great kneeler. My husband loves it for gardening and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kneeler. My husband loves it for gardening and weeding. I really need to order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: gooneybird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best kneeling pad I've ever used. It's BIG. no more balancing on tiny pad. It's soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: compost

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice looking I hesitate to put it in the dirt! More comfortable than regular foam ones.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: Use this for kneeling while teaching CPR. Very comfy and large area to scoot around.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and much better than foam pads!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better (and more expensive) than our old foam pads. I am buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Calsummer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for yoga!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kneeling poses in Yoga! Easy to carry with the handles and light weighrt.
customer_reviews.author: EAP

customer_reviews.title: Very cushy cushion!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sit on a stool to pull weeds in my garden/yard. It is very comfortable to sit on and a little bigger than most you can buy. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyleen

customer_reviews.title: emory pad is good. Better than kneeling on a hard floor
customer_reviews.text: This .emory pad is good. Better than kneeling on a hard floor. I would have given it a 5if it were a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Since I already have one bad knee, I am sensitive to kneeling. My knees when right to the hard tile with this kneeler. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: S Peterson

customer_reviews.title: great product for the knees for doing work outside
customer_reviews.text: great product for the knees for doing work outside. we used two and sewed them together to make thicker
customer_reviews.author: Sirena

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable on my knees
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable on my knees. It took quite a while to receive it but then I found out why. It comes all the way from China
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McClard

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Very good quality. I can use it with opening into two sides or if I want it to be higher I just dont open it and let two side stack together. Love the memory foam that my knees wont hurt when kneeling.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: She is a great help with the little things in the yard
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my wife. She is a great help with the little things in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Bobw

customer_reviews.title: Knee/Back Saver for dog baths
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome - might be a little more expensive but super worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your knees will thank you
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for gardening! My knees are in love! Far exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: J Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Just an overall quality product
customer_reviews.text: I liked all about the product. This product is used as a personal pad when doing gardening work.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Curtice - Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife. She loves gardening and after both knees replaced, she can now kneel painlessly.
customer_reviews.author: L Hande

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband has major knee issues and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: C J.

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied With This
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time. Cushions my 230 lb bod!
customer_reviews.author: garyj

customer_reviews.title: Very thick cushion
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick pad. Great for kneeling at tub giving my grandson his bath.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Crisler

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: The pad is thick enough to kneel on with comfort
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Save your knees with this
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and very comfortable to use. It's great as a seat on the grass as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy in Austin

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. The size is great - way bigger than others I've used - so you can move around a bit more on it. It's very comfortable and soft - but not too soft!
customer_reviews.author: Janice D Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Love this one!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas. He is the one who likes to scrub floors on his hands and knees. He LOVES it! It is thicker than other kneeling pads and large enough to accommodate both of his knees. I also purchased another type of kneeling pad for him to use outdoors because this one is too nice to be using in muddy flower beds, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Sifers

customer_reviews.title: but this pad works great! No more bad
customer_reviews.text: Work requires alot of kneeling, but this pad works great! No more bad knees
customer_reviews.author: Donna S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way more comfortable than a regular foam mat. Nice quality product.
customer_reviews.author: sassyway

customer_reviews.title: Portable and worth every penny I paid!
customer_reviews.text: I've got a ton of projects around the house that require me to be on the floor, and the strain on my knees, back, and derriére were just unbearable. I'd wanted a creeper seat with memory foam but none of them sat low enough and offered the kind of cushion for what I needed. Fortunately I found this and it's been a delight. The surface area when folded out is wonderful, and the dual cushioning is a necessary feature for me. So glad I bought this, I'll be using it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: The Notorious TM-B

product_meta.title: KI Store Garden Kneeling Pad Extra Thick Large Kneeler for Work Bath Removable Neoprene Portable Water Resistant Memory Foam Cushion Slow Recovery with Shock Absorbing EVA Foam Gray
feature_bullets: Notice: Memory foam is hard in low temperature, it would be re-soften when used or days get warmer. Ideal for gardening, household, bathing for kids, shedding your pets, picnic and outdoor activities. Extra Large and Thick Kneeling pad for Mother's day and Father's day gift present for Dad!
Extra thick and shock-absorbing. High density memory foam kneeling pad with EVA foam well protect knees from hard and uneven ground.
Double water-resistant layer protection. Neoprene cover makes it effectively block the water. Water-resistant interior layer works excellent to prevent foam swelling when water seep through seam.

Easy to clean with removable and washable Neoprene cover. Light weight and portable, folded just as the size of briefcases when folded, it is easy to be taken out for any activities outside. Notice: Please do not drying.
Extra large when expanded. There are spaces to change positions as you want. Folded size: 11”x13.4”x4.72” Unfolding Size 22“x13.4”x2.36”

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars167 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
